title: How much money does Elton John make a year? - Quora

response.answer_text: Earnings overview for Elton John's annual income according to Forbes and Billboard dating back to 2012 is as follows: Forbes Oct 2019: $84 million Forbes 2018: $46 million Forbes June 2017: $60 million Forbes July 2016: $42 million Forbes June 2015: $53.5 million Forbes Dec. 2014: $45 million Forbes November 2013: $54 million Forbes May 2012: $80 million Billboard Feb 2013: $ 8,575,518.13
